Detailed Description

The small login dialog that is displayed when a members user details are not stored. Fergus Morrow fergus@enopen.co.uk

Definition at line 23 of file GUILogin.h.

Member Function Documentation

- (void) initWithParent: (id)  parent  

This instantiates the object, opens the nib file and sets it's "owner" object.

Definition at line 19 of file GUILogin.m.

- (IBAction) logIn: (id)  sender  

Is called when a user clicks the "login button" - throws the users details back to the "owner" object.
